parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Game 2 Editor

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return argument in mission editor of a given object. 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Some Old Editor Command</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> map '''evalObjectArgument''' [object, argument]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> map: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [object, argument]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Anything]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>''// returns string "[1009.0351, 1319.4928]"''
([[findDisplay]] 128 [[displayCtrl]] 51) [[getObjectArgument]] ["_unit_1", "POSITION"]

''// returns array [1009.0351, 1319.4928]''
([[findDisplay]] 128 [[displayCtrl]] 51) [[evalObjectArgument]] ["_unit_1", "POSITION"]
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setObjectArguments]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
